And welcome to the Founders Makers Digital Graduate Assessment.

Are you ready to get going?

Get Started

How you'll be assessed.

We'll ask you ten questions in this assessment. You'll be judged on three factors:

  • Your ability to think creatively and critically, challenging briefs to deliver on a client's objectives.
  • Your understanding of digital marketing as a whole, thinking about how translate strategic insights into action.
  • Your ability to find useful and interesting insights from various data sources, on and offline.

These questions will be related to this role and digital marketing. You can look things up as you go — in fact, we'd encourage it!

We will review the best answers to this assessment on a regular basis, and get in touch with you as soon as we can, if you qualify for an interview.

When you're ready, click the button below to start the quiz.

See the Questions
